thread.section_title: BenQ Direct Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of BenQ Direct | benqdirect.com
thread.title: David Johns
thread.title_full: BenQ Direct reviewed by David Johns

author: David Johns
title: David Johns
text:
Being over four decades past the age of consent and a Computer Scientist, Network Architect and former DOD IT Executive, I have tested, bought and deployed literally thousands of computer monitors.
Also as an active gamer during that time, I have been from Zork on mainframes to Deus Ex and Fallout 4 on my own hand built gaming "racers".
Other than a couple of top end Dell's, my new 32" BenQ 4K HDR is like owning a whole new category of viewing device. Paired with an EVGA 980, an i7700K, Corsair liquid cooling, M2 PCIE and over 7 terabytes of Samsung 950 series SSD's, running on an ASUS Maximus VII Hero, this monitor does true justice to the latest visual candy driving our newest generation of gaming experiences.
If you are looking for an incomparable optical experience, have the $ to buy same, and are in the "tweak it till you peak it" Geek segment, then all I can say is:
WHAT IS STOPPING YOU?
If it is the current batch of Asus or Acer, statistically "accelerated" frame rates, Curviness, and to date very poor quality control, then you have a lot of technical curve left to put in your knowledge base.
Work harder, look deeper, test better and:
Buy BenQ
